channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ahead of the holidays, consumer and child advocacy groups warn against AI toys

item.title: She cares for her aging parents full time. That requires taking care of herself, too
item.description: Dawnita Brown left her job to become a caregiver for her parents. Brown says it's a gift to care for her parents, but it can also be difficult. That's...

item.title: Surf's down! Munich, until now an inland surfing hotspot, has lost its biggest wave
item.description: Munich's famous river wave, the Eisbachwelle, vanished after a dredging in early November. Authorities are working to resurrect the beloved wave but i...

item.title: Eating just a handful of plastic can be fatal for marine animals, a study finds
item.description: Scientists have long known that plastic waste is bad for marine animals. A new study quantifies how little ingested plastic it takes to be a lethal do...

item.title: A bipartisan show of respect and remembrance is set for Dick Cheney’s funeral, absent Trump
Multicultural New Orleans awaits arrival of ‘Swamp Sweep’ immigration crackdown
India’s TCS gets TPG to fund half of $2B AI data center project
item.description: TCS and private equity firm TPG will invest up to $2 billion to build data centers for AI training and inference in India.

item.title: Another fire breaks out at aluminum plant that supplies Ford
item.description: It's the second major fire -- and the third overall -- in the last few months at the Novelis plant in Oswego, NY.

item.title: Border Patrol is monitoring US drivers and detaining those with ‘suspicious’ travel patterns

item.title: As its voice dictation app takes off, Wispr secures $25M from Notable Capital
item.description: Voice AI company Wispr is raising $25 million in funding merely months after its $30 million Series A.

item.title: Google releases Nano Banana Pro, its latest image generation model

item.title: Spotify’s latest feature lets you transfer playlists from other services
item.description: Spotify has partnered with TuneMyMusic on a new in-app feature that lets users import their playlists from other streaming services.
